title: 129 Esten DR S, Elliot Lake, ON P5A3L2 House For Sale | RE/MAX | SM240028
text: Property Description for 129 Esten DR S Super Location!! Enjoy owning a blue ribbon winner of a home. Spacious 3 bedroom home, primary bedroom has view of natural forest. Full closets and one has a closet organizer. 4pc bathroom upstairs and linen closet. The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms have spacious closets. 2 bathrooms. A step saver, kitchen without that crowded feeling. Comes with Fridge and Stove. Home offers an eat-in country kitchen that offers loads of storage and counter space. Spacious living room with large windows for plenty of natural light. 2pc bathroom on main floor next to foyer and entry door. Full basement is partially finished. Laundry room and workshop area and an extra wardrobe closet for out-of-season storage. Gas forced air. Central Vacuum. Flat yard with plenty of storage for the toys and backs onto scenic natural forest. Trees provide shady comfort in the summer and watch the season change in your own backyard. Quick closing possible.
